original_text:
“‘Heaven is my throne,
    and the earth is my footstool.
What kind of house will you build for me, says the Lord,
    or what is the place of my rest?
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 하늘은 나의 보좌요 땅은 나의 발등상이니 너희가 나를 위하여 무슨 집을 짓겠으며 나의 안식할 처소가 어디냐

sentences.original_text: and the earth is my footstool.
What kind of house will you build for me,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나를 위해 어떤 집을 짓겠느냐

sentences.original_text: or what is the place of my rest?
